title: Inviting to university teachers to take a course
original_prompt:
Think like a university professor and scriptwriter specializing in making videos.

The university is going to offer a course, which is aimed at university professors. The course aims to learn about the correct use of technology to design study materials.

First: Generate the name and a captivating, eye-catching and detailed description for the new course.

Second: Write a script for a 1 minute promotional video about the course.

Finish the script and description, encouraging teachers to take the course.

            "Tech-Savvy Teaching: Designing Engaging Study Materials"

        "course_description": [

'Tech-Savvy Teaching' is a transformative course designed specifically for university professors who aspire to enhance their teaching methodologies through innovative technology.             "Closing shot: Course details on screen with a call to action to enroll now."
        ],
        "call_to_action": [
            "Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your teaching! Enroll in Tech-Savvy Teaching today and become a leader in educational innovation."
        ]
    }
}
